bibl.title: Greek and Coptic Texts from the Oriental Institute Museum Exhibition "Another Egypt".
bibl.note: Greek Texts. - Pp. 85-87: Stamped Amphora Handles: 3 Rhodian and 1 of uncertain origin. - P. 88: Inscribed Bronze Lamp in the Form of a Dove. Medinet Habu, 6th-8th cent. A.D.
WILFONG Terry G., Greek and Coptic Texts from the Oriental Institute Museum Exhibition "Another Egypt".
